When reviewing this document, review the activity and controls on dormant accounts. Assess controls over dormant accounts and processes for removing accounts from the dormant list. Review internal audit procedures over dormant accounts. Verify that the individual reviewing dormant activity reports does not have access to dormant account activations.
 

Look for items such as:

 

  • Dormant account activity reports are not reviewed or lack signature
    verification
  • Dormant account reviews are completed by employee with account
    access (e.g., lack of segregation of duties)
  • Looks for unusual patterns in the reports (e.g., very small deposits
    after a lengthy period of time, same teller reactivated a large percentage of dormant accounts)
  • The address of the account holder has recently changed
